headline: TransDigm Agrees to Buy Servotronics for $110M, Expands Portfolio
summary: TDG is set to acquire Servotronics, a designer of highly engineered servo valves, for $110 million.

raw.headline: TransDigm Agrees to Buy Servotronics for $110M, Expands Portfolio
raw.summary: TDG is set to acquire Servotronics, a designer of highly engineered servo valves, for $110 million.
